title: A Lesson on Human Suffering from a Kibbutz

description: The new Netflix heist movie is implausible and silly, but solid performances make it a decent winter diversion.

description: Not even the great Mandy Patinkin can save Hulu's derivative high-seas murder mystery.

title: Drugs like Ozempic and Wegovy Show No Link to Suicide, FDA Says
